amendment.description: To restore the maximum percentage of hazard mitigation contributions that may be made for a major disaster.

action.text: Amendment SA 3612 ruled out of order by the chair.

Amendment SA 3612 proposed by Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S9015-9016; text: CR S9015) To restore the maximum percentage of hazard mitigation contributions that may be made for a major disaster.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3612 proposed by Senator Harkin.
